channel.title: How to stop npc's of bieng noclip HELP!
channel.description: Hello i've finnaly made my source but i've gotta get npc's stop bieng noclip when you attack them. So npc's can't go though walls and bushes and objects. can anybody tell me a tutorial or do you know it? Please help:/ :confused:

item.title: How to stop npc's of bieng noclip HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

when you spawn them, it should look something like this:

spawn = 200	1975	5004	0	0	0	0	0	1	Daquarius

The 200 is the code, 1975 and 5004 are the Coords, the first 0 is the height, and the rest are where it can walk. So, if it looks like:

spawn = 200	1975	5004	0	4231	2313	1323	1323	1	Daquarius

Or something like that, it’s wrong. Make it look so that it has 4 0s after the height.

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop npc's of bieng noclip HELP!
